Class fuzzy.FuzzyRule 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----fuzzy.FuzzyRule
public class FuzzyRule
extends Object
Container for a fuzzy rule. This class contains vectors of left-part and right-part expressions (before and after "then") for a fuzzy rule.

FuzzyRule()
Constructor.
FuzzyRule(String)
Constructor.

evaluateRule()
Evaluate left part and execute right part of a pre-parsed rule.
evaluateRuleText()
Evaluate left part and execute right part of a pre-parsed rule.
getEvaluationResult()
Returns the result of the left part evaluation.
getLabel()
Return this rule's label.
getLeftPartExpressions()
Returns the java.lang.Vector containing all expression for the left part of the rule.
getRightPartExpressions()
Returns the java.lang.Vector containing all expression for the right part of the rule.
isRuleFired()
Returns true if the rule fired (during executeRule call).
setLabel(String)
Set label for this rule.

evaluateRuleText 
 public String evaluateRuleText() throws EvaluationException
Evaluate left part and execute right part of a pre-parsed rule. Changes value of the private variable evaluationResult. This call will set flagRuleFired to true if any expression fires.

Returns:
java.lang.String Returns text representation of the rule with all expressions evaluated.
evaluateRule 
 public void evaluateRule() throws EvaluationException
Evaluate left part and execute right part of a pre-parsed rule. Changes value of the private variable evaluationResult. This call will set flagRuleFired to true if any expression fires.
